tool_description: Welcome to the Secure Email API 🚀, an API that provides functionalities for encrypting, decrypting, signing, and verifying emails to ensure secure communication.
name: EEA - Email Encryption API
title: EEA - Email Encryption API

api_list.name: Verify a Message Signature
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to verify the integrity and authenticity of a signed message using the Secure Email API. You need to provide the message and its signature as parameters. The API uses a public key derived from the private key used for signing to verify the signature. It returns a response indicating whether the signature is valid or not.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://eea-email-encryption-api.p.rapidapi.com/verify"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "eea-email-encryption-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Sign a Message
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to digitally sign a message using the Secure Email API. The API generates a private key, signs the provided message with it using the PSS padding scheme and the SHA256 hashing algorithm, and returns the generated signature.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://eea-email-encryption-api.p.rapidapi.com/sign"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "eea-email-encryption-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Decrypt an Encrypted Message
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to decrypt an encrypted message using the Secure Email API. You need to provide the encrypted message and the encryption key as parameters. The API uses the provided encryption key to decrypt the message and returns the original plaintext message
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://eea-email-encryption-api.p.rapidapi.com/decrypt"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "eea-email-encryption-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Encrypt a Message
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to encrypt a message using the Secure Email API. The API generates a unique encryption key and uses it to encrypt the provided message. The encrypted message and the encryption key are returned as a response.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://eea-email-encryption-api.p.rapidapi.com/encrypt"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "eea-email-encryption-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
